title: Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans - Moneycontrol
content: Edelweiss Housing Finance ties up with SBI for co-lending in priority sector home loans  Moneycontrol
description: A subsidiary of Edelweiss Financial Services, EHFL said the alliance will leverage the combined reach of both the partners in tier II and tier III markets to ensure timely disbursal of housing credit to customers.
